item.description:
Anyone interested in coming and seeing these magnificent boats from all over the world - there is almost 40 of them. Only 7 of them are open to public viewing (Thursday night's meetup).
This cruise goes all around Boston harbor so all of the boats can be seen and enjoyed as they are berthed all around the harbor.
The weather is supposed to be fine so it would be a great day to be on the water!

Cost is $75 and the link to book tickets is below.
Boarding is at 11.30 from Long Wharf and the cruise is from 12 -2pm with Boston Harbor Cruises

My cell is (617) 840 4131 if you need to find me - I'll be down there around 11.15
Come have some fun in the sun and see some beaut boats!


http://www.sailboston...

http://secure3.gatewa...

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Tall Ship viewing and lobster lunch cruise
